entities.description: The NSDUH survey capturing data on substance use, mental health, and other demographics.
The date the survey data was collected (04-APR-2023).
Categories of responses recorded in the NSDUH survey.
Indicator whether the respondent experienced cargo theft in the past.
An array of specific criminal offenses as classified under UCR.
Count of responses not adjusted for survey design.
The percentage of respondents within each category of answers.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the specific date of data collection.
Indicates the response categories available in the survey.
Specifies the unweighted frequency counts of responses for each category.
Specifies the percentage of respondents for each response category.
Indicates whether the respondent has experienced cargo theft.
Specifies the type of criminal offense as classified under UCR.
